Class Query

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Contains strings for querying the database.

        Get the score for a specific category
        Parameters:

        viewName - The name of the database view
        isTimeRelevant - Indicating if time is relevant, rather than points.
        Returns:
        An SQL statement that will get all scores for the category.

                                            boolean withDeletedOnes,

        Get all scores
        Parameters:
        event_id - The id of the event
        withDeletedOnes - Indicating if deleted scores should be loaded as well.
        orderByName - Indicating if the scores should be ordered by name (true) rather than by time_needed or points_achieved (false).
        Returns:
        An SQL statement that will get all scores

      • createScoreViewForCategory

        public static java.lang.String createScoreViewForCategory​(long event_id,
                                                          java.lang.String viewName,
                                                          int minAgeInclusive,
                                                          int maxAgeInclusive,
                                                          int gender)
        Create a score view for a category.
        Parameters:
        event_id - The id of the event
        viewName - The name of the view
        minAgeInclusive - The minimum age of the category (inclusive)
        maxAgeInclusive - The maximum age of the category (exclusive)
        gender - The gender of the category
        Returns:
        An SQL statement that will create the score view

      • createCategory

        public static java.lang.String createCategory​(long event_id,
                                              java.lang.String name,
                                              java.lang.String description,
                                              int minAgeInclusive,
                                              int maxAgeInclusive,
                                              Gender gender)
        Creates a Category in the Database
        Parameters:
        event_id - Event ID of the Event
        name - Event Name
        description - Event Description
        minAgeInclusive - Lower Age Level which includes Competitor to the Category
        maxAgeInclusive - Higher Age Level which includes Competitor to the Category
        gender - Genders which are for that Category
        Returns:
        A SQL statement which creates a Event Entry in the Database

        gender - Gender of the Competitor

                                           java.lang.String description,
                                           boolean is_time_relevant)

        Parameters:

        date - Date of the Event
        date_descr - Event Date Description
        description - Event Description
        is_time_relevant - Boolean if the Event is Time relevant
        Returns:

      • createScore

        public static java.lang.String createScore​(long event_id,
                                           long competitor_id,
                                           java.time.LocalTime time_needed,
                                           double points_achieved,
                                           int number_of_tries,
                                           boolean is_valid,
                                           java.time.LocalDateTime time_of_recording)
        Creates a Score in the Database
        Parameters:
        event_id - Event ID which is relevant for this Score
        competitor_id - Competitor ID which is relevant for this Score
        time_needed - Time which was needed for this Score
        points_achieved - Points which are achived for this Score
        number_of_tries - How many tries are needed for this Score
        is_valid - If the Score is valid
        time_of_recording - When the Score has been recorded
        Returns:
        A SQL statement which creates a Score Entry in Database
